example.eg: Make sure you come directly home from school; don't go to your friends' houses or the park on the way.
example.egtrans: 下了课就直接回家；不要去你朋友家，或者半途到公园里去。

example.eg: The politician amazed the interviewer by answering the question directly.
example.egtrans: 政客坦率地回答了问题，让采访者大为惊讶。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 坦率地, 直接了当地

example.eg: I'll come over to see you directly.
Witnesses claimed that directly before the accident, the driver had been talking on his mobile phone.
example.egtrans: 目击者称，刚好在事故发生之前，司机正拥手机打电话。

example.eg: When he got the phone call, Mark left the meeting directly and didn't come back.
example.egtrans: 马克一接到电话就立刻离开了会议，再也没回来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 立刻, 马上, 即刻

example.eg: To reassure my mother, I phoned her directly I got home.
example.egtrans: 为了让母亲放心，我一到家就给她打了电话。

example.eg: Distance and time are directly proportional when speed is constant: driving for two hours gets you twice as far away as one hour would.
